## MapViewUtils.calculateWorldSizeByFocalLength() function

Calculates object's world size based on the focal length and it's camera distance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function calculateWorldSizeByFocalLength(focalLength: number, distance: number, screenSize: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  focalLength | number | Focal length in pixels (see \[\[calculateFocalLengthByVerticalFov\]\]) |
|  distance | number | Object distance in world space. |
|  screenSize | number | Object size in screen space.  object size in world space. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
